  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataField, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class DescriptionJTextArea
extends CustomJTextArea
implements IDataField
    creates a textbox which allows the user to enter a description for the game the description cannot be empty when creating a game
    Author:
    Bobby Drop Tables
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • validateField

        public boolean validateField(IErrorView errorField,
                    boolean showLabel,
                    boolean showBox)
        Description copied from interface: IDataField
        Runs over all of this DataFields subcomponents and validates all of the fields. This method throws/displays any errors if there are any problems with the users input.

        WARNING: Be sure that all implementations of this method EXCEPT for the highest level call on this method NEVER set the warningField to the empty string

        Specified by:
        validateField in interface IDataField
        Parameters:
        errorField - The external warning field that you want to indicate the error to. See the warning above on the use of this warningField
        showLabel - to show a label if the text is invalid
        showBox - to show a box around this field if the field is invalid
        Returns:
        true when all of the fields in this component are valid

      • hasChanges

        public boolean hasChanges()
        Description copied from interface: IDataField
        Runs over all of this DataFields subcomponents and checks to see if there are any changes since this panel was instantiated.
        Specified by:
        hasChanges in interface IDataField
        Returns:
        true when the user has made changes to the field since it was created or set
